pages.text: $(p)$(p)$(p)$(p)$(p)$(p)Thank you, Smisle - thank you for choosing to spend your time here with me and for brightening my life every day.

Thank you very much to my past and continued supporters on Patreon and PayPal:$(li)Freebi Peers$(li)Jon$(li)LeonOwO$(li)Nicolhaq$(li)nooby$(li)Silvanus_Hunter$(li)SureenInk$(li)Vagabond$(li)Xorbah$(li)Yun
